caption.title: Monthly environmental variables data for Chenzhou, 2006–2015. The x-axis is arranged by year and within the segment of each year the values are ranked by month from January to December.
caption.p: Tem: temperature (°C), H: relative humidity (%), Pre: precipitation (mm), NDVI: the normalized difference vegetation index, TVDI: the temperature vegetation dryness index (the values in some moths were abnormal and have been removed from the analysis).
